item.title: DDwrt/Openwrt Router
item.description: Open-wrt Suggested Small Devices # wr703n: modified to 16M flash + 64M ram. Power: 5V*100mA = 0.5W (80mA w/o wifi). see 703N config steps & procedure alternative: GL-AR150: 16M + 64M (POE & SMA ready) GL-MT300A: 16M flash + 128M DDR1. Power: 3W. Big for home: MTK7620A ; 2nd hand Mercury. Alternative With Battery # TL-MR11U 2000mAh, replacable battery.150Mbps ¥ 139 TL-MR10U 2600mAh, bulid-in battery. 150Mbps ¥ 160 Abbreviations # POE: Power Over Ethernet.
